title: oTrumai varumA
sahitya:
oTrumai varumA inda ulagam kalakaminri vAzhum


anupallavi

  kuTramaTruk-kaTru ninru kulam onrenak-kUDi vAzhum


caraNam    neTri tannai alankarippAr nerungi vandAl ahankarippAr
veTruraigaL vIN sheyalgaL viruppu veruppup-puyalgaL
naTravap-periyAr tammai naghaiyADuvar paghaiyADuvar
shuTrulagin shurukka vAzhvil shuDu pOrkkaLak-koDumaiyinri
